channel.title: 317 ---- Adding shops ---- 317
channel.description:
my first post!
Add the npc to autospawn.cfg
So it would be like this:
spawn = ### 2843 3675 0 0 0 0 0 2 seller
First ### is NPC's id, next ones is coords and you dont have to edit the last numbers.
And to get coords for the npc just go to spot you want the npc to be and type ::mypos (Should be in all sources)
Next you need to add items to the shop
So open shops.cfg
Heres an example:
shop = 1 general_store 2 2 (itemid) (amount) (itemid) (amount) (ect) (ect)
"general_store" is the name of the shop wich will see when you open the shop shop = 1 is where u put ur shop id replace 1 with ur id
And last part. Open client.java and search for
WanneShop = 30;
And if you dont find that, search for
case 155: //first Click npc
And scroll down for few secs until you see alot of wanneshops.
Then just add
else if (NPCID == ####) { // id of shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ##; //Id of shop }
heres an example else if (NPCID == 522) { //shop_keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; //general_store }
and ur done

item.title: 317 ---- Adding shops ---- 317
item.dc:creator: @k1ll3r160 k1ll3r160
item.description:
@k1ll3r160 wrote:

my first post!

Add the npc to autospawn.cfg

So it would be like this:

spawn = ### 2843 3675 0 0 0 0 0 2 seller

First ### is NPC’s id, next ones is coords and you dont have to edit the last numbers.

And to get coords for the npc just go to spot you want the npc to be and type ::mypos (Should be in all sources)

Next you need to add items to the shop

So open shops.cfg

Heres an example:

shop = 1 general_store 2 2 (itemid) (amount) (itemid) (amount) (ect) (ect)

“general_store” is the name of the shop wich will see when you open the shop
shop = 1 is where u put ur shop id replace 1 with ur id

And last part. Open client.java and search for

WanneShop = 30;

And if you dont find that, search for

case 155: //first Click npc

And scroll down for few secs until you see alot of wanneshops.

Then just add

else if (NPCID == ####) { // id of shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = ##; //Id of shop
}

heres an example
else if (NPCID == 522) { //shop_keeper
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1; //general_store
}

and ur done

Read full topic
